sentences.sentence: Or you may act disruptively in your current relationships.
sentences.translation: 或者你可能破坏现在的人际关系。

sentences.sentence: Similarly, Linux kernel data structures can also be logged and even modified non-disruptively, as well.
sentences.translation: 类似地，同样可以无干扰地记录Linux内核数据结构的日志，甚至进行修改。

sentences.sentence: The way to implement an innovation so it will transform an organization is to implement it disruptively.
sentences.translation: 用这样的方法实施革新，实施起来会是组织遭到颠覆。
